description: An Amount on the Ripple Protocol, used also for XRP in the ripple-rest API
title: Amount

___currency.description: The currency expressed as a three-character code

___issuer.description: The Ripple account address of the currency's issuer or gateway, or an empty string if the currency is XRP

___counterparty.description: The Ripple account address of the currency's issuer or gateway, or an empty string if the currency is XRP

___value.description: The quantity of the currency, denoted as a string to retain floating point precision
